pageContext.other: Modern card, fields do not match data entry template, weight given as 3 3/4 oz.,
pageContext.publications: a) Proc. Devon Arch. Exploration Soc. I (1929-32), 74 no. 3,b) Sketch with details by Dr. J.A. Woods (DF)
pageContext.collection: FRENCH, Mr Hermon - private,Watergate, Widecombe-in-the-Moor, Devon.
pageContext.site: devon,south brent,corringdon farm,found before 1932 in an old lane leading down from the moor under corringdon ball, at about 800' o.d. after heavy winter floods had torn up the roadway (a),gr based on the point at which a major trackway crosses the 800 foot contour immediately to the south of the hill top corringdon ball. this places findspot close to corringdon farm which ties in with the site description annotated on the sketch by dr. woods (b)
